00017   void ShowerShapeEngine::registerParameters()
00018   {
00019     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("ShowerShapeEngine_inputCol",
00020                                                    "input collection of shower shapes",
00021                                                    _showerShapeColName,
00022                                                    std::string(""));
00023 
00024     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("ShowerShapeEngine_prefix",
00025                                                    "ShowerShapeEngine prefix to tree variables",
00026                                                    _prefix,
00027                                                    std::string("showerShapes"));
00028 
00029  
00030    }
00031

00037   /*********************************************************************************/
00038    void ShowerShapeEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00039   {
00040     if ( _prefix.size() > 0 )
00041       if ( _prefix[ _prefix.length()-1 ] != '_' )
00042         _prefix += "_";
00043 
00044     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"nClusters").c_str(),    &_nClusters, 
00045                      string(_prefix+"nClusters/I").c_str());
00046   
00047     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"cogX").c_str(), _cogX, 
00048                      string(_prefix+"cogX["+_prefix+"nClusters]/F").c_str());
00049  
00050     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"cogY").c_str(), _cogY, 
00051                      string(_prefix+"cogY["+_prefix+"nClusters]/F").c_str());
00052    
00053     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"cogZ").c_str(), _cogZ, 
00054                      string(_prefix+"cogZ["+_prefix+"nClusters]/F").c_str());
00055 
00056     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"energy").c_str(), _energy, 
00057                      string(_prefix+"energy["+_prefix+"nClusters]/F").c_str());
00058 
00059     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"nHits").c_str(), _nHits, 
00060                      string(_prefix+"nHits["+_prefix+"nClusters]/I").c_str());
00061 
00062  
00063   }
00064

00068   /*                                                                               */
00069   /*********************************************************************************/
00070   void ShowerShapeEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00071   {
00072     /*Initialize variables (otherwise variables may keep values from previous events)*/
00073 
00074     _nClusters = 0;
00075     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < MAX_CLUSTERS; ++i)
00076       {
00077         _cogX[i]   = 0;
00078         _cogY[i]   = 0;
00079         _cogZ[i]   = 0;
00080         _energy[i] = 0;
00081         _nHits[i] = 0;
00082       }
00083     
00084 
00085     /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086    std::vector<ClusterShapesTyped*> allClusters;
00087 
00088     StringVec v_colNames;
00089     evt->getParameters().getStringVals( _showerShapeColName, v_colNames );
00090 
00091     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n Start loop over "<<v_colNames.size()<<" collections named "<<_showerShapeColName<<std::endl;
00092 
00093     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < v_colNames.size(); i++ )
00094       {
00095         try 
00096           {
00097             LCCollection* incol_i = evt->getCollection( v_colNames[i] );
00098 
00099             streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n Collection "<<v_colNames[i]<<endl;
00100 
00101             /*
00102               for (int iHit = 0; iHit < incol_i->getNumberOfElements(); ++iHit)
00103               {
00104               CalorimeterHit *hit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(incol_i->getElementAt(i));
00105               const float *position = hit->getPosition();
00106               float energy   = hit->getEnergy();
00107               
00108               streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<" hit "<<iHit+1<<" x="<<position[0]<<", y="<<position[1]<<", z="<<position[2]
00109               <<", energy="<<energy<<endl;
00110               }
00111             */
00112 
00113             ClusterShapesTyped* shape_i = new ClusterShapesTyped;
00114             shape_i->fill<CalorimeterHit>(incol_i);         
00115             
00116             allClusters.push_back(shape_i);
00117           
00118           }
00119         catch ( DataNotAvailableException &err) 
00120           {
00121             streamlog_out(WARNING) << "collection " << v_colNames[i] << " not available" << std::endl;
00122           }
00123       }/*end loop over input shower shapes collection*/
00124     
00125  
00126     unsigned int nClusters = allClusters.size();
00127     _nClusters = nClusters;
00128     
00129     for ( unsigned iCluster = 0; iCluster <  nClusters; iCluster++ ) 
00130       {
00131         float *pos_cog = (allClusters[iCluster])->getClusterShapesPointer()->getCentreOfGravity();
00132         float energy = (allClusters[iCluster])->getClusterShapesPointer()->getTotalAmplitude();
00133         int nHits = (allClusters[iCluster])->getClusterShapesPointer()->getNumberOfHits();
00134 
00135         _cogX[iCluster] = pos_cog[0];
00136         _cogY[iCluster] = pos_cog[1];
00137         _cogZ[iCluster] = pos_cog[2];
00138 
00139         _energy[iCluster] = energy;
00140         _nHits[iCluster]  = nHits;
00141 
00142         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n cluster "<<iCluster+1<<" pos_cog=("<<pos_cog[0]<<","<<pos_cog[1]<<","<<pos_cog[2]<<")"<<endl;
00143         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"  nhits ="<<nHits<<endl;
00144         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"  energy="<<energy<<endl;
00145 
00146 
00147       }/*end loop over clusters*/
00148 
00149   }/*fillVariables*/
00150 
00151 }/*namespace marlin*/
